name: bcrypt

about.description: Modern password hashing for your software and your servers
about.summary: Modern password hashing for your software and your servers

about.description: Modern password hashing for your software and your servers
about.summary: Modern password hashing for your software and your servers

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: bcrypt
  version: 4.3.0

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/${{ name[0] }}/${{ name }}/${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 3a3fd2204178b6d2adcf09cb4f6426ffef54762577a7c9b54c159008cb288c18

build:
  number: 1
  script:
    # PyPy has weird sysconfigdata name
    - if: "build_platform != target_platform and target_platform == \"linux-ppc64le\""
      then: rm -f $PREFIX/lib/pypy$PY_VER/_sysconfigdata.py
    - ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv
    - cd src/_bcrypt
    - cargo-bundle-licenses --format yaml --output THIRDPARTY.yml

requirements:
  build:
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then: python
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then: cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - ${{ compiler('rust') }}
    - cargo-bundle-licenses
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools >=42.0.0
    - setuptools-rust
  run:
    - python

tests:
  - python:
      pip_check: true
      imports:
        - bcrypt
        - bcrypt._bcrypt
  - files:
      source:
        - tests
    requirements:
      run:
        - pytest >=3.2.1,!=3.3.0
    script:
      - pytest tests

about:
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file:
    - LICENSE
    - src/bcrypt/THIRDPARTY.yml
  summary: Modern password hashing for your software and your servers
  description: |
    Modern password hashing for your software and your servers
  homepage: https://github.com/pyca/bcrypt/
  repository: https://github.com/pyca/bcrypt/
  documentation: https://github.com/pyca/bcrypt/

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - djsutherland
    - jan-janssen
    - xhochy

about.description: Modern password hashing for your software and your servers
about.summary: Modern password hashing for your software and your servers
